segments.text: I'm taking in all the intricate details of this line drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way the water is rendered, a constant stream flowing over the sink, is quite effective.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how much detail is packed into this simple style.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tidy garden visible through the window makes the interior mess even more striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the small squares of the window panes, so perfectly aligned.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then my eyes go back to the puddle and the woman's wet foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not feel that cold water seeping into her shoe?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of soggy socks is honestly a bit revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the cookie jar clearly labeled, almost inviting the children's raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The splayed legs of the stool really emphasize its instability.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a clever composition, highlighting different levels of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The artist has done a good job of showing potential chaos within normalcy.
segments.speaker: PAR
